about.seoDescription: PYMERP helps small businesses organize and control their operations.
about.title: What is PYMERP?
about.body: Hi, we're @pymerp and we help small businesses organize and control their operations so they can focus on selling and growing. This is our version 0.0.1 at www.pymerp.cl ‚Äî we hope it brings value to your business. We'll keep evolving alongside you.

costs.seoDescription: Standard plan free until February 2026 during beta.
costs.betaHeadline: We are in a testing stage with real customers.
costs.betaLine1: All accounts created until February 28, 2026 have the Standard Plan FREE.
costs.betaLine2: Includes all current features plus upcoming improvements.
costs.betaLine3: From March 2026, subscription billing will be enabled; we'll notify you beforehand so you can decide whether to continue.
costs.betaNote: üí° During the beta, we do not charge or issue invoices. Subscription payments start in March 2026.
costs.title: Agenda/Web Catalog Pricing - PYMERP
costs.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your business

basic.title: Basic
basic.desc: Up to 3 products or services and 5 schedules.

standard.title: Standard
standard.desc: Up to 15 products or 10 services and 15 schedules.

pro.title: Pro
pro.desc: Unlimited products, services, and schedules. Includes 2 monthly requests for catalog/agenda design (images and layout) plus custom layouts.

costs.appBody: Business resource management software designed for entrepreneurs.

privacy.seoDescription: Learn how PYMERP protects your personal data and credentials.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At PYMERP we take the confidentiality and security of your information very seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data and access credentials.
privacy.dataBody: Name, email, contact phone, company information (business name, industry, address), and platform usage records.
privacy.useBody: We use your data only to provide the service (agenda/web catalog), enable your access, send operational notices, and improve the platform. We do not sell your data to third parties.
passwordItems: Passwords are stored hashed with industry-standard algorithms (hash and salt).
We never share passwords by email; reset links are single-use and expire.
We recommend unique passwords and will enforce complexity policies when needed.
securityItems: Traffic between your browser and our servers is over HTTPS.
Data is stored with cloud providers that follow security standards and best practices.
Access controls by roles and action traceability are applied.
We back up data periodically to ensure continuity and recovery after incidents.
privacy.rightsBody: You may request access, rectification, or deletion of your data by writing to support. If you detect a security incident, notify us immediately so we can help protect your account.

terms.seoDescription: PYMERP usage rules: accounts, content, intellectual property, responsibilities, and payments.
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These Terms govern the use of the PYMERP platform (agenda/web catalog) by entrepreneurs and end users.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance and use
acceptance.body: By registering you accept these Terms and agree to use the platform in line with the law and good business practices.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and credentials
accounts.body: You are responsible for keeping your credentials confidential and for all activity under your account. You must notify us of any unauthorized use.

content.title: 3. Content and ownership
items: You keep ownership of the content you upload (text, images, prices), but grant us a limited license to display it within the service.
Copying, cloning, or reusing the platform, its code, design, layouts, or catalogs without PYMERP's express authorization is prohibited.
Bulk data extraction, scraping, or reverse engineering of the platform is prohibited.

availability.title: 4. Availability and service
availability.body: We work to keep the platform available, but scheduled interruptions or incidents may occur. We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability.

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibilities
items: The user is responsible for the accuracy of published information (prices, descriptions, schedules).
PYMERP is not liable for indirect losses or lost profits arising from use or inability to use the service.

payments.title: 6. Payments and plans
payments.body: Plans and usage limits (products, services, schedules) are detailed in the costs section. Plan changes may adjust those limits.

ip.title: 7. Intellectual property and anti-copy
items: PYMERP and its logos, layouts, templates, and software are protected by copyright and intellectual property.
Reproduction, redistribution, or adaptation of the software without written authorization is prohibited.
Attempting to bypass security, duplicate the service, or reuse components without authorization is a contractual violation and may lead to legal action.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.body: We may suspend or terminate access if these Terms are breached. You can cancel at any time; we may retain data according to legal obligations.

changes.title: 9. Changes to the Terms
changes.body: We may update these Terms; we will notify significant changes. Continued use means you accept the modifications.

contact.seoDescription: Get in touch with PYMERP for support or feedback.
contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: I'm available to provide close assistance (24/7 as much as possible) and we'll work together to deliver the best service. Write to me at
contact.feedbackSubtitle: Leave your comments and I will get in touch with you.
contact.commentPlaceholder: Tell me how we can improve

beta.seoDescription: Read the usage terms for the PYMERP beta.
beta.title: Beta usage terms
beta.intro: This beta version of pymerp.cl is in testing with real customers. By using it you accept the following points:
items: The platform may change, update, or present issues typical of a beta stage.
No charges or invoices are issued during the beta.
Until February 28, 2026 all accounts have the Standard Plan for free, including released improvements.
From March 2026 subscription payments will be enabled; we will notify you beforehand and you can decide whether to continue.
The information published (texts, images, prices, schedules) is the responsibility of each user.
PYMERP may suspend or terminate access in case of abuse, misuse, or attempts to copy/reverse-engineer.
beta.support: If you have questions or need support, contact us at {{email}}.
